items.title: 99.99% of Your Traces  Are (Probably) Trash (SRECon NA 2024).pdf
items.author: Paige Cruz
items.description: The document discusses the challenges and strategies associated with application tracing, highlighting the evolution and issues faced from 2010 to 2019, including the steep learning curve and lack of standards. It examines sampling strategies, such as head-based and tail-based sampling, detailing their benefits and drawbacks while emphasizing the importance of capturing 'interesting' traces. The document concludes with a comparison of different sampling methodologies and their effectiveness in tracing performance.

items.title: 実開発で学んだ⽣成AI活⽤とプロダクト導⼊の壁
items.author: imaimai
items.description:
キャディは「製造業向け AI データプラットフォーム」の実現に向け、
プロダクト機能の強化と組織生産性の向上の両面で生成 AI を活用しています。
PoC の段階を越えて実運用へ展開する過程では、想定以上に多様な壁が立ちはだかります。
本セッションでは、その壁にどう向き合い、どのように乗り越えたか…
